_source.short_desc: Influitive offers a unique solution designed for CS, CX, and Product teams to engage with customers and gather rapid feedback.
_source.long_desc: Influitive offers a unique community solution designed for CS, CX, and Product teams to engage with customers and gather rapid feedback on any topic. Influitive combines a modern approach to forums and gamification and even integrates with existing communities powered by Salesforce and Khoros to create seamless customer experiences. The community solution also supports employee intranets.
_source.target_audience: Influitive's customers include some of the fastest-growing B2B companies, like IBM, Cisco, ADP, and Adobe. Read their testimonials and results on our website!

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk provides the complete customer service solution that's easy to use and scales with your business.
related_products.features: Zendesk is the only complete customer service solution, that is both easy to use and scales with your business. On average, companies using Zendesk increase customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% - at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline community management,  memberships, email marketing, website design & more.  Try A Demo!
related_products.features:
---- TRY OUR 7-DAY FREE TRIAL:
https://www.brilliantdirectories.com/trial  ----

Brilliant Directories offers an Affordable, All-In-One Member Management Solution to streamline all aspects of your membership website or association.  A complete, turn-key solution with quick setup and free, unlimited support from real people. Includes website design, online payment processing, multi-level memberships, past due monitoring, premium member's only content, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Flock is a collaboration tool that helps you get work done, only faster! Trusted by over 32,000 businesses globally.
related_products.features: Build your community with Flock! From instant messaging and web conferencing to creating channels and integrating with your favorite external apps like Google, MailChimp, Dropbox, Jira, Trello and more - Do more together. Flock is a powerful tool that comes loaded with built-in features like Shared To-Dos, Reminders, Notes, Polls and more! Start for FREE

related_products.short_desc: Create a stand-alone branded website for your members. and engage with your customer community.
related_products.features:
QuestionPro is a leading SaaS survey solutions company providing a wide range of applications to measure and manage customer experience, employee engagement, and the pulse of the audience. Conduct video discussions and multiple polls with online communities.

Send surveys in under 5 mins with 40+ question types, ready-made survey templates, and customizable design themes. We are ISO 27001 certified and comply with leading data security standards and data privacy laws including GDPR.

related_products.short_desc: ON24 provides digital experiences and webcasting for corporate communications and demand generation via a cloud-based SaaS application.
related_products.features: ON24 is on a mission to redefine how organizations engage with their audiences, powering interactive, data-rich webinars and content experiences that help people connect on a more human level and make smarter business decisions. Through ON24, marketers can create Live, On Demand and Personalized Engagement, turn it into actionable intelligence and integrate it across their operations. Informed by over a billion engagement minutes, marketers drive more revenue from ON24 than any other channel.

related_products.short_desc: Quip is a new way to collaborate with your team that combines documents, spreadsheets, to-do's, and chat in one seamless experience.
related_products.features: Quip is a new way to collaborate with your team and customers that combines documents, spreadsheets, checklists, and chat in one seamless experience. Create an easy-to-use intranet by organizing your content into shareable folders for easy navigation and discovery. Used by thousands of the most innovative companies in the world: Facebook, NewRelic, Quora, and Pinterest. Available on web, Mac, Windows, Android, and iOS. Get started with Quip for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Strengthen community engagement and grow fully branded private communities with Hivebrite's all-in-one community management platform.
similar_products.features: Hivebrite is an all-in-one community management platform. It empowers organizations of all sizes and sectors to launch, manage, and grow fully branded private communities. Hivebrite is completely customizable and provides all the tools needed to strengthen community engagement. Keep member data up-to-date, manage memberships and events, collect payments, centralize communication, and more from one easy-to-use platform. Over 1000 clients worldwide use Hivebrite to create and engage communities.

similar_products.short_desc: Bring together your community, online courses, sales pages, and more in one place under your brand, across the web, iOS and Android.
similar_products.features: Mighty Network serves creators and entrepreneurs by bringing together their community, online courses, sales pages, and more, all under their brand, across the web, and native iOS and Android apps. Connect members to each other with an activity feed, sub-groups, member categories, chat messages, and more. Create articles with a rich CMS, embed images, videos and sound files, and post engaging questions and polls, all of which support comments and cheers.

similar_products.short_desc: InSided is the only customer community platform built for B2B SaaS and subscription-based companies.
similar_products.features:
InSided is the leading customer community platform for B2B SaaS and subscription-based companies. We are the only community platform built specifically for B2B SaaS. 

Our customer community platform helps SaaS companies become market leaders by driving digital customer engagement at scale.

In short, with inSided you reduce pressure on the customer success team, build customer engagement & advocacy, and get product feedback & ideas.

similar_products.short_desc: Higher Logic Thrive is a powerful yet simple member experience solution, improving interactions across the member lifecycle.
similar_products.features:
Purpose-built for associations, Higher Logic Thrive is a powerful yet simple member experience solution touching every stage of the member lifecycle. Built on nearly 20 years of serving associations, we understand your unique needs, and that's reflected in everything we do. 
 
The Higher Logic Thrive portfolio contains three products: Higher Logic Thrive Platform, Higher Logic Thrive Community, and Higher Logic Thrive Marketing.

similar_products.short_desc: Bazaarvoice's community software lets you easily connect to customers to build customer relationships and drive loyalty.
similar_products.features: Bazaarvoice's community software lets you easily connect to customers and turn their feedback into high-quality user-generated content (UGC) that drives customer loyalty. Amplify the voice of your customer and discover influencers who are perfectly aligned with your brand.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 Virtual community and enablement platform to recruit & mentor students, engage alumni & volunteers, & cultivate donors at scale.
similar_products.features: Graduway is the leading community, development, and enablement company that provides tools and technologies supporting the entire virtual community lifecycle for nonprofits, schools, and universities. From recruiting and mentoring students or volunteers to cultivating donors, Graduway enables all online community management. In addition to partnerships with over 2,000 educational institutions, the company extends its solutions to other nonprofits and healthcare organizations worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Zapnito is the SaaS community platform for intelligent organizations.
similar_products.features:
Zapnito is the SaaS community platform for intelligence-driven organizations. We power branded, expert communities that allow members to learn, share knowledge and collaborate.

An all-in-one community and learning platform, Zapnito provides all the tools you need to engage, retain and grow your communities so they stay longer, spend more, and encourage others to do the same.

similar_products.short_desc: The Webex Events (formerly Socio) online event community platform enables year-round, continuous attendee engagement and networking.
similar_products.features: The Webex Events (formerly Socio) online event community platform allows marketers and event organizers to build a hub for continuous attendee engagement. Event marketers and organizers can connect their customers and power ongoing learning, engagement, collaboration, and networking in one central location. Enable year-round participation with virtual events, virtual roundtables, games, and more, all hosted within the online community. Full branding and customization options are also available.

similar_products.short_desc: Participate is an online platform for streamlining the set-up and management of social learning communities.
similar_products.features:
Participate allows organizations with models that depend on social learning communities to scale their initiatives, with no loss in quality, while streamlining their operations. 

Using our social learning platform, customers can easily create, grow, and sustain social learning communities. Our ability to capture, aggregate and and give recognition for knowledge created in these communities is our key differentiator.

similar_products.short_desc: Give your community a digital space where they can connect with you and your mission 365 days a year even when meeting isn't possible.
similar_products.features:
Make it your business to enable everyone in your community develop lasting relationships with you and each other via 1-on-1 chats, private and open groups, social walls, virtual business cards, community hub, webinars and more. 

Give your community a digital space where they can share their ideas, discuss various topics and stay social even when meeting in person is not an option.

Enable your community to thrive now. 

Glue Up (a.k.a. EventBank) is an all-in-one software for communities.

similar_products.short_desc: More than ever, we need a place to bring everyone together and help each person succeed. That's Jostle.
similar_products.features: Discover a seriously simple tool that brings people together. Why? Because today's organizations are more complex than ever: people are dispersed, there's more info, and we have more ways to communicate than ever before. Striving to create a community at your workplace is a noble goal, but it shouldn't add to this complexity. You need a way to help people participate in your culture and feel the value of the contribution they make. Jostle is designed to empower people and organizations.

similar_products.short_desc: Open Social is a purpose-built community engagement platform perfect for volunteer, organization, and professional member management.
similar_products.features:
Create digital spaces that empower your members to share

Open Socials community engagement platform allows organizations to empower their members to come together, communicate and collaborate from anywhere in the world.  Drive real-world change and create organizational value with an online platform and purpose-built extensions for managing, mobilizing and engaging new and existing members.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Directory software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Directory tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Directory software is used to create product and services classifieds, informational portals and membership lists with or without monetization options.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Networking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Networking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Social Networking software supports customer interactions with one another as well as with the organization. Search Engine optimization, blogging, podcasting, newsletters, profile pages, message boards, viral content and membership directories are all Social Networking software features, which can increase web-traffic, visibility, and interactivity for companies with a web presence. Social Networking is related to Contact Management software, Content Management software, Membership Management software, and Portal software.

_source.short_desc: Influitive is a customer engagement and loyalty platform, helping B2B companies acquire, grow, and retain customers - at scale.
_source.long_desc: Influitive is the market-leading advocacy, community, and engagement platform of choice for the world's most customer-obsessed brands. Leverage the advanced segmentation and gamification engine to drive continuous engagement and guide customer journeys.
_source.target_audience: Influitive's customers include some of the fastest-growing B2B companies, like IBM, Cisco, ADP, and Adobe. Read their testimonials and results on our website!

related_products.short_desc: The best way for brands to collect reviews and build trust with customers is on Trustpilot, the world's most powerful review platform.
related_products.features: Trustpilot is a customer review management tool best suited for medium to large-sized online businesses to connect and build trust with customers, giving every brand the power to turn consumer feedback into concrete results. Collect, manage, and display customer reviews to improve conversions, stand out in SERPs, and boost sales. Start a free account to get powerful reporting & analytics, review invitations & reminders, onsite review widgets, Google Seller Ratings, rich snippet stars, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Reviews is a best-in-class reputation management platform that helps businesses rank higher on search and win more customers.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Reviews is an online review management software that allows you to solicit, respond, and amplify
reviews. It connects to your CRM/PMS system and sends out automated review requests. See all your reviews
across Google, Facebook and 200+ sites in one workspace and auto-respond to reviews at scale. Amplify your
reviews across search, social, paid ads, and your website. Assign negative reviews to team members for
corrective action.

related_products.short_desc: Review management done right. Get more reviews and manage your current reviews from one dashboard. Trusted by over 100k businesses.
related_products.features:
Podium simplifies review management by making it easy to collect reviews and rise in the ranks of local search. 

Our platform is built on text messaging, so your customers can leave you reviews in 20 seconds with 2 clicks. 

With robust tools to simplify the review process, you can automate review invites, respond to reviews, track trends, and more all from one easy-to-use platform. 

Get your free 14-day trial and join over 100k businesses on Podium.

related_products.short_desc: End-to-end client experience platform built for small businesses.
related_products.features: Meet Thryv, the end-to-end client experience platform built for small businesses. Thryv integrates essential business functions like estimates and invoicing, appointment scheduling, payment processing, text and email campaigns, managing customer lists, social media, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business.
related_products.features: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business. From the first phone call to the final invoice and every touchpoint in between, Weave connects the entire customer journey. Weave's software solutions transform how local businesses attract, communicate with and engage customers to grow their business.

related_products.short_desc: Swell automates your review requests and management so you can create an online reputation that fuels growth.
related_products.features: Swell boosts your visibility online by sending customized review invitations texts that earn you reviews on platforms like Google, Facebook, and more. You can manage and respond to reviews directly from your dashboard, monitor performance, see trends, and gather actionable insights from customer feedback. Ultimately Swell helps you rank higher in search results so prospects can find you and connect with you through a suite of seamless communication tools.

related_products.short_desc: A local commerce platform that provides apps, APIs, marketing, and financial tools for over 500,000 American businesses.
related_products.features: Our mission is to help local businesses thrive in a digital world. Founded in 2011, Womply is a local commerce platform that provides apps, APIs, marketing, and financial tools to make local commerce happen for over 500,000 American businesses and their customers. All of Womplys products and services are powered by the Womply Commerce Graph, a proprietary data asset that offers the most complete view of local commerce.

related_products.short_desc: A centralized platform for multi-location marketers to reach and engage their local customers, across 100s or 1000s of local pages.
related_products.features: SOCi is an award-winning localized marketing platform built specifically for multi-location marketers. Our customers include top brands and influencers like Ace Hardware, Sport Clips, and Anytime Fitness who have the impossible challenge of managing their digital presence across hundreds and thousands of locations. As central command for multi-location marketers, SOCi makes the impossible possible by enabling top brands and their locations to strengthen and scale their digital presence.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 white-label review management and marketing platform for marketers, agencies and SEOs.
related_products.features: The #1 white-label review management and marketing platform for marketers, agencies and SEOs. Grade.us lets you: 1) automate getting more and better reviews on sites like Google, Facebook and industry-specific review sites; 2) recover unhappy customers before they write bad reviews; 3) monitor reviews across the Web so you always know what's being said about your brand; 4) automatically turn your best reviews into SEO-friendly Web and social media content to amplify your positive reputation.

related_products.short_desc: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves.
related_products.features: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves. And we're still leading! Let us show you what you should expect from an integrated, patient acquisition and engagement solution!  As the individual practices we started out serving have grown, we've added specialized features for multi-unit operations. We now support many of the nation's largest health systems and retail-based networks.

related_products.short_desc: CallSource offers business leaders the ability to manage and respond to reviews automatically saving valuable resources.
related_products.features:
How much does a review impact your business every day? If you aren't sure but consider reviews to be a powerful driver of business then reputation management might be just what you need.
Whether you have one review or thousands across dozens of review websites you need a way to manage your reputation. Your business can thrive with CallSource's review management solutions so you can get back to doing what you do best.

similar_products.short_desc: Birdeye Reviews is a best-in-class reputation management platform that helps businesses rank higher on search and win more customers.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Reviews is an online review management software that allows you to solicit, respond, and amplify
reviews. It connects to your CRM/PMS system and sends out automated review requests. See all your reviews
across Google, Facebook and 200+ sites in one workspace and auto-respond to reviews at scale. Amplify your
reviews across search, social, paid ads, and your website. Assign negative reviews to team members for
corrective action.

similar_products.short_desc: Swell automates your review requests and management so you can create an online reputation that fuels growth.
similar_products.features: Swell boosts your visibility online by sending customized review invitations texts that earn you reviews on platforms like Google, Facebook, and more. You can manage and respond to reviews directly from your dashboard, monitor performance, see trends, and gather actionable insights from customer feedback. Ultimately Swell helps you rank higher in search results so prospects can find you and connect with you through a suite of seamless communication tools.

similar_products.short_desc: Review management solution that allows medical organizations to manage online reviews and receive alerts for new reviews.
similar_products.features: ReviewIQ is a comprehensive healthcare platform for online review generation. Using our Direct Link technology, individual healthcare professionals, as well as large practices, are able to instantly collect patient reviews via text or email and boost their online rating. Positive experiences are utilized to propel online presence through review generation, across sites such as Google, Facebook, Healthgrades, and many more.

similar_products.short_desc: Review management done right. Get more reviews and manage your current reviews from one dashboard. Trusted by over 100k businesses.
similar_products.features:
Podium simplifies review management by making it easy to collect reviews and rise in the ranks of local search. 

Our platform is built on text messaging, so your customers can leave you reviews in 20 seconds with 2 clicks. 

With robust tools to simplify the review process, you can automate review invites, respond to reviews, track trends, and more all from one easy-to-use platform. 

Get your free 14-day trial and join over 100k businesses on Podium.

similar_products.short_desc: Bazaarvoice's review management software gives you total control to collect, display, and manage your ratings and reviews at scale.
similar_products.features: Bazaarvoice's review management software allows brands and retailers to manage ratings and reviews at scale, easily collect & display fresh user-generated content (UGC) in a way that inspires fast and confident purchases, and helps improve e-commerce experience to drive revenue, scale brands, gain actionable insights and build customer loyalty.

similar_products.short_desc: ReviewInc's online reputation management and customer experience software drives new online reviews and ratings.
similar_products.features:
ReviewInc provides Online Reputation Management and Customer Experience Software. ReviewInc's Reputation Management Software helps your business get more reviews, manage your existing ones, and automate review campaigns.

Our customer experience tools are a flexible and automated communication system that tracks every step in the customer-facing processes. With a few easy steps, businesses can create a flexible customer experience to make their business shine.

similar_products.short_desc: NiceJob is the easiest way to get more reviews and manage them all from one platform.
similar_products.features: NiceJob is the easiest way to get more reviews and manage them all from one platform. Our software allows you to collect reviews from your customers through automated campaigns easily. You can manage all your reviews from all your different channels on our easy-to-use platform. Take it one step further by turning your 5-star reviews into customer stories that you can share on your website and your social media.

similar_products.short_desc: Monitor, respond, and analyze customer feedback from dozens of channels with this all-in-one review management platform.
similar_products.features:
-- Automate your reputation management on any global platform (marketplaces, local business sites, review platforms, app stores, social media and more). 
-- Respond to Reviews and Questions on supported channels. 
-- Get real-time alerts and use workflows, route cases and prioritize to get the job done efficiently. 
-- Make it easier to listen, engage with customers, and collect actionable insights to boost ratings and drive conversation rates.

similar_products.short_desc: A media monitoring and social listening tool that boasts real-time global coverage, advanced brand analytics, and market insights.
similar_products.features:
Having a quick and simple overview of where and in what light your brand is mentioned is the difference between being an industry leader or barely existing.

Mediatoolkit helps you track brand mentions over 100 mil online sources (from social media to forums, etc.) and gain valuable insight from your customers.
The sentiment analysis feature lets you instantly know when your brand is mentioned in a negative way.
Keep your reputation intact and prevent crises well before they become na issue!

similar_products.short_desc: ReviewTrackers business solutions allow for analyzing, amplifying & maximizing insights to accelerate acquisition and retention.
similar_products.features:
ReviewTrackers empowers 175,000+ business locations to understand their customers better through advanced review and customer feedback technology. 

Our business solutions allow for analyzing, amplifying, and maximizing insights to accelerate business acquisition and improve retention while driving more authentic connections with customers.

similar_products.short_desc: pulseM is a review management platform that allows businesses to automatically request reviews and generate leads.
similar_products.features: pulseM is the #1 review management platform built for home services. We make it easy for you to manage customer feedback, automate your review generation, and address customer issues in real-time from any device. Turn customer reviews into your competitive advantage with pulseM. Request a demo to get started today!

similar_products.short_desc: Optimize review management process with 5-star rating system, auto social posting, and negative feedback blocking capability.
similar_products.features:
CAPTERRA VISITORS: Get 30% Off Your First Month!

Get More Reviews is the #1 most trusted reputation management and review generation software used to optimize your review management process with a 5-star rating system, auto social posting, and negative feedback blocking capability. With Get More Reviews, you'll be able to turn your happiest customers into 5 star reviews online and generate real, authentic reviews on multiple online review sites including Google, Facebook, and much more!

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 white-label review management and marketing platform for marketers, agencies and SEOs.
similar_products.features: The #1 white-label review management and marketing platform for marketers, agencies and SEOs. Grade.us lets you: 1) automate getting more and better reviews on sites like Google, Facebook and industry-specific review sites; 2) recover unhappy customers before they write bad reviews; 3) monitor reviews across the Web so you always know what's being said about your brand; 4) automatically turn your best reviews into SEO-friendly Web and social media content to amplify your positive reputation.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Brand Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Brand Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Brand Management software includes a variety of tools for creating, compiling, updating and storing product information. Among many functions of such software are ad building, requirements management, product material distribution and communications management. For related software see: Marketing Automation software and Digital Asset Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Loyalty software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Loyalty tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: With Customer Loyalty software, companies can strengthen relationships with their customers in a number of different ways. Gift cards, points and rewards programs, email updates, incentives, VIP programs and more can all help create a loyal customer base. Directories related to Customer Loyalty software are Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Service software, Marketing Automation software and Public Relations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Satisfaction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Satisfaction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Satisfaction software allows businesses to collect, organize, and manage customer feedback. These applications provide survey, complaint tracking and call reporting capabilities. Customer Satisfaction software can integrate with Customer Relationship Management and Product Management solutions to help apply the acquired feedback to business interactions and product development.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reputation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reputation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reputation Management software helps organizations keep on top of what is being said about the organization and their products in various blogs, social networks, and media. Analytical capabilities of Reputation Management software allow marketing departments to measure and evaluate consumers' reactions to marketing campaigns and help companies better plan their future outreach. Reputation Management software is related to Brand Management software and Social Networking software.
